BOARD_SETTINGS_CATEGORY_GENERAL_DESCRIPT: Adjust general settings within this board
BOARD_SETTINGS_CATEGORY_INVITES_DESCRIPT: You can control who can create invites in the Ranks tab.
BOARD_SETTINGS_CATEGORY_NOTES_DESCRIPTIO: Adjust how notes look and perform actions on certain events
BOARD_SETTINGS_CATEGORY_RANKS_DESCRIPTIO: Ranks allow you to assign permissions to members in your board
BOARD_SETTINGS_NOTES_COMPACT_MODE_DESCRI: Makes notes take up less space on the screen and displays less information
BOARD_SETTINGS_NOTES_PERFORMABLES_SET_TI: set the title of the note to
BOARD_SETTINGS_NOTES_PERFORMABLES_ADD_CO: add content to the notes title
BOARD_SETTINGS_NOTES_PERFORMABLES_REPLAC: replace the content of the note
BOARD_SETTINGS_RANKS_CREATE_RANK_SUGGEST: Click "Create Rank" to create a new rank!
BOARD_SETTINGS_RANKS_MANAGE_MEMBERS_DESC: Members with this permission can modify the nickname and permissions of other members
BOARD_SETTINGS_RANKS_MODERATOR_DESCRIPTI: Moderators have the ability to invite members to the board as well as kicking members from the board
BOARD_SETTINGS_RANKS_ADMINISTRATOR_DESCR: Members with this permission have full access to the board and can modify everything
BOARD_SETTINGS_RANKS_VIEW_CHATROOMS_DESC: Allows members to access chatrooms in the board
BOARD_SETTINGS_RANKS_SEND_CHATROOM_MESSA: This permission allows members to send messages in chatrooms
BOARD_SETTINGS_RANKS_MANAGE_BOARD_DESCRI: Members with this permission can edit certain settings in the board such as ranks
BOARD_CREATION_NAME_REQUIRED: You need to enter a name for this board!
BOARD_CREATION_NAME_TOO_SHORT: The name of this board needs to be longer than 2 characters
BOARD_CREATION_NAME_TOO_LONG: The name of this board needs to be shorter than 64 characters
BOARD_JOIN_INVITE_LINK_INVALID: This invite code is invalid or expired
BOARD_JOIN_INVITE_LINK_UNAUTHORIZED: You are not permitted to join this board
BOARD_LOADING_PROMOTIONAL_CONTENT_LINE_1: Do you want faster loading times among other great features?
BOARD_LOADING_PROMOTIONAL_CONTENT_LINE_2: Support the development of Poplet with
BOARD_NOT_FOUND_BODY_LINE_1: This board either doesn't exist, or you don't have access to see it.
FEEDBACK_THANKS_DESCRIPTION: Every little contribution and report makes Poplet better for everybody, so thanks for taking the time out of your day to be awesome!
FEEDBACK_REPORTING: What are you reporting on this fine day?
FEEDBACK_HAPPENED_WHAT: So, {{0}}, can you explain what happened exactly?
FEEDBACK_TEXTAREA_SUBTEXT: I've even given you this nice little textbox so you can tell us what happened.
FEEDBACK_COMMENT_SUBTEXT: What feedback did you want to leave for the developers?
FEEDBACK_LOCATION_MISSING: You need to include where this incident happened.
FEEDBACK_TYPE_MISSING: You need to include something to submit.
HOME_RECENTLY_VIEWED_NONE: You haven't recently viewed anything. When you do, it'll show up here.
HOME_ACTIVITY_FEED_NO_ACTIVITY: Nothing new in your feed. Check back later!
LANDING_INTRO_DESCRIPTION: A note-taking application with rich features
LANDING_INTRO_SUBTEXT: Some ideas are more complex than others â€” Poplet strives to let you take notes the way you want.
LANDING_CARD_1_DESCRIPTION: Including features that you're used to like assigning members to notes, due dates, importance sorting and more.
LANDING_CARD_2_DESCRIPTION: The ability to fine-tune the nitty gritty details, such as the positioning and style of your notes.
LANDING_CARD_3_DESCRIPTION: Getting work done with your mates couldn't be easier.
LOGIN_EMAIL_PASSWORD_MISSING: You need to enter an e-mail and password.
LOGIN_ERROR: Our servers seem to be experiencing some problems at the moment, try again later
FATAL_ERROR_BODY_LINE_1: We've logged this error, and we'll look into it as quick as we can.
FATAL_ERROR_BODY_LINE_2: If the error keeps happening, consider filing a bug report on our
LABEL_NAME_TOO_LONG: Label names must be 32 characters or less
LABEL_NAME_REQUIRED: You need to enter a name for this label!
NAME: Name
MODAL_DELETE_NOTE_BODY_LINE_1: Are you sure you want to delete this note? This cannot be undone.
MODAL_BETA_BODY_LINE_1: Hey! Thanks for participating in the Poplet public beta.
MODAL_BETA_BODY_LINE_2: Poplet is still under heavy development. Downtime, bugs or data loss may occur.
MODAL_INVITE_MEMBERS_BODY_LINE_1: Share the code below with people you want to join your board.
MODAL_INVITE_MEMBERS_BODY_LINE_2: They can enter this code into the "Join a Board" screen.
POPOUT_MEMBER_MORE_ACTIONS_SOON: More actions coming soon. Stay tuned!
FREEPLACE_DESCRIPTION: Freeplace allows you to place notes without restrictions in any position
GRID_DESCRIPTION: Snap to Grid means all notes/groups can only be placed on grid lines
CONNECTING_BODY_LINE_1: An error occured whilst trying to load Poplet
CONNECTING_BODY_LINE_2: Sorry about that. Looks like we're experiencing some technical difficulties at the moment, and we're unable to connect you to Poplet.
CONNECTING_BODY_LINE_3: This is just a temporary issue, and Poplet will up and running in no time. Thanks for your patience.
USER_SETTINGS_INACCESSIBLE: You need to be signed in to access user settings
USER_SETTINGS_GENERAL_COMPACT_MODE_DESCR: Makes notes and other components take up less space on the screen; a simplified view.
CHATROOM_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Send a message to this chatroom
